k: This controls the calculation of the stats shown in this tab.
v: 這個選項卡的面板顯示計算出來的統計信息.

k: The stats in the sidebar are always shown in Effective DPS mode, regardless of this setting.
v: 右邊側邊欄的統計信息始終是 "有效 DPS" 模式,不受這裡設置影響

k: Unbuffed: No auras, buffs, or other support skills or effects will apply. This is equivelant to standing in town.
v: 無增益效果: 無光環□增益效果□輔助技能效果影響. 相當于站在奧瑞亞.

k: Buffed: Aura and buff skills apply. This is equivelant to standing in your hideout with auras and buffs turned on.
v: 有增益效果: 受到光環□增益效果□輔助技能效果影響. 相當于開啟光環有增益效果站在藏身處.

k: In Combat: Charges and combat buffs such as Onslaught will also apply. This will show your character sheet stats in combat.
v: 戰鬥狀態: 受到充能球和戰鬥 BUFF 還有猛攻影響. 相當于你的角色在戰鬥狀態.

k: Effective DPS: Curses and enemy properties (such as resistances and status conditions) will also apply. This estimates your true DPS.
v: 有效 DPS: 受到詛咒和敵人屬性(例如敵人的抗性和狀態條件)影響. 相當于你的真實DPS.

k: (Brand Damage is any Damage dealt by Brand Skills or by Skills Triggered by a Brand)
v: （由烙印技能和烙印觸發的技能造成的傷害都為烙印傷害）

k: (When an Impaled enemy is hit, the Impale reflects 10% of the physical damage of the Impaling hit to that enemy. Impale lasts for 5 hits or 8 seconds)
v: ( 當被穿刺的敵人被擊中，穿刺會反射 10% 穿刺之擊所造成的物理傷害至敵人。穿刺持續 5 次擊中 )

k: (Enemies that are Debilitated have 20% less Movement Speed and deal 10% less damage)
v: （【疲憊】的敵人總移動速度額外減慢 20%，造成的總傷害額外降低 20 %）

k: (Physical Damage Reduction is lower against Overwhelming Hits, but cannot go negative)
v: （物理傷害減免對抗猛攻擊中效果會降低，但不會變為負值）

k: (Armour is treated as double value, only for calculating damage mitigation)
v: （護甲被視為雙倍數值，只用于緩阻傷害）

k: (Chill reduces Enemy Action Speed by up to 30%, depending on the amount of Cold Damage in the hit, for 2 seconds)
v: (冰緩依據擊中的冰冷傷害總量減少敵人行動速度，至多30%，持續2秒)

k: (Brand Critical Strikes are any Critical Strikes dealt by Brand Skills or by Skills Triggered by a Brand)
v: （由烙印技能和烙印觸發的技能造成的暴擊都為烙印暴擊）

k: (Effects cannot be slowed below 25% of their normal expiry rate)
v: （效果無法低于正常消退速率的 25%）

k: (You are in Blood Stance by default)
v: （你默認為血姿態）

k: (Alchemist's Genius increases Flask Charges gained and effect of Flasks by 20%, for 4 seconds)
v: （鍊金奇才使藥劑使用次數和藥劑效果提高 20%，持續 4 秒）

k: (Normal Monsters have 1 Power, Magic Monsters 2, Rare Monsters 10, Unique Monsters 20, and Players 5)
v: （普通怪物的威力為 1，魔法怪物為 2，稀有怪物為 10，傳奇怪物為 20，玩家為 5）

k: (Being Covered in Ash applies 20% less Movement Speed and 20% increased Fire Damage Taken, and lasts for 4 seconds)
v: (處于灰燼纏身狀態的敵人移動速度減少20%，受到的火燄傷害提高20%，持續 4 秒)

k: 100% chance to Defend with 200% of Armour\nMaximum Damage Reduction for any Damage Type is 50%
v: 100% 機率用 200% 護甲防禦\n對任何傷害類型的最大傷害減免為 50%

k: When your Hits Impale Enemies, also Impale other Enemies near them\nInflict 4 additional Impales on Enemies you Impale\nFor 4 seconds after you Impale Enemies, they cannot be Impaled again, and Impales cannot be Called from them
v: 當你的擊中穿刺敵人時，同時穿刺他們附近的敵人\n對你穿刺的敵人造成 4 次額外穿刺\n你穿刺敵人後 4 秒，他們不能再次被穿刺，鋼之呼喚不能從他們身上移除穿刺

k: Brand Skills have 12% increased Duration
v: 烙印技能增加 12% 持續時間

v: 你可以施放 2 個額外烙印

v: 格擋時 25% 機率獲得耐力球

k: Life Flasks gain 2 Charges every 3 seconds
v: 生命藥劑每 3 秒獲得 2 充能

k: 12% increased Impale Effect
v: 增加 12% 穿刺效果

k:
Your Hex Curse Spells create a Hexed Area for 1 second if you Cast them yourself
Enemies in the Hexed Area are Hexed, and the Hex does not expire while in the Hexed Area
Hexes applied this way do not gain Doom over time
Hexes in the Hexed Area gain up to maximum Doom when the Hexed Area ends
v:
你的咒術詛咒法術製造 1 個咒術區域 1 秒
在咒術區域的敵人被咒術，且在咒術區域時，咒術不會失效
此方式套用的咒術不會隨著時間獲得厄運
當咒術區域結束時，在咒術區域內的咒術獲得最大上限厄運

k: 16% increased Chaos Damage
v: 增加 16% 混沌傷害

v: 敏捷不提供固有的閃避值加成\n每 15 點敏捷 +1 法術傷害壓抑率

k: Strength's Damage bonus applies to all Spell Damage as well
v: 力量加成的傷害同時套用至全部法術

k: Intelligence provides no inherent bonus to Energy Shield\n2% reduced Duration of Elemental Ailments on you per 15 Intelligence
v: 智慧不提供固有的能量護盾加成\n每 15 點智慧減少 2% 你身上元素異常狀態的持續時間

k: Cannot Recover Energy Shield to above Evasion Rating\nEvery 2 seconds, gain a Ghost Shroud, up to a maximum of 3\nWhen Hit, lose a Ghost Shroud to Recover Energy Shield equal to 3% of your Evasion Rating
v: 能量護盾無法回復超過閃避值\n每 2 秒獲得 1 層幽魂屍布，最多 3 層。被擊中時，\n失去 1 層幽魂屍布以回復 5% 等同於你閃避值的能量護盾

k: Cannot Recover Energy Shield to above Armour\n3% of Physical Damage prevented from Hits Recently is Regenerated as Energy Shield per second
v: 能量護盾無法回復超過護甲\n近期被防止擊中的 5% 總物理傷害，以每秒回復為能量護盾

k: -25% to maximum Chance to Block Attack Damage\n-25% to maximum Chance to Block Spell Damage\n+2% Chance to Block Spell Damage for each 1% Overcapped Chance to Block Attack Damage
v: -25% 最大攻擊傷害格擋率\n-25% 最大法術傷害格擋率\n每 1% 超過上限的攻擊傷害格擋率 +2% 法術傷害格擋率
